0.text: Innate: Both Lamb and Wolf mark targets to hunt. Scoring a  takedown on a marked target permanently empowers Kindred's abilities, as well as granting Lamb 75 − 250 (based on Marks)  bonus range on her basic attacks and  Mounting Dread.

1.text: Innate - Lamb: Lamb is offered a selection of enemy  champions to take down if she hasn't been in combat with them in the last 6 seconds. Once selected, the mark is applied after an 8-second delay and thereafter it can be collected by Kindred. Lamb gains the ability to select a new target every 75 seconds. Targets successfully hunted cannot be marked again for 4 minutes.

2.text: Innate - Wolf: Starting at 3:15, Wolf periodically marks a random large  monster within the enemy team's jungle for 180 seconds. The marked camp is highlighted on the mini map to both teams. Once slain, Wolf will wait 45 seconds before selecting a new target.

3.text:
The type of monster that Wolf can mark changes based on Kindred's current Marks:
0 :  Rift Scuttler
1 – 3:  Rift Scuttler,  Crimson Raptor,  Gromp
4 – 7:  Ancient Krug,  Blue Sentinel,  Greater Murk Wolf, or  Red Brambleback
8 + :  Rift Herald or  Baron Nashor,  Dragon or  Elder Dragon

0.text: Active: Lamb  dashes toward the target location, gaining  25% (+ 5% per  Mark) bonus attack speed for 4 seconds.

1.text: After dashing, Lamb fires up to three arrows at nearby  visible targets, each one dealing physical damage upon their arrival. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.

2.text: Casting  Wolf's Frenzy or using Dance of Arrows while inside its area will reduce this ability's  cooldown to an amount.

3.text: Lamb can cast any of her abilities during Dance of Arrows'  dash.

4.text: Dance of Arrows  resets Lamb's basic attack timer.

0.text: Passive: As Kindred move and attack, they build up to 100 stacks of Hunter's Vigor. At full stacks, Lamb's next basic attack  heals her for up to 49 − 100 (based on level), based on Kindred's missing health.

1.text: Active: Wolf  dashes to the target location and claims the surrounding area as his territory for the next 8.5 seconds, separating from Lamb. Wolf autonomously attacks enemies within the area, prioritizing Lamb's attack target.

2.text: Wolf's basic attacks deal magic damage and scale with 25% of Kindred's bonus attack speed. Against monsters, Wolf deals 50% increased damage and his attacks  slow the target by 50% for 2 seconds.

origin: 25 / 30 / 35 / 40 / 45 (+ 20% bonus ad) (+ 1.5% (+ 1% per  mark) of target's current health)

scalingPartType: % per  mark of target's current health

origin: 37.5 / 45 / 52.5 / 60 / 67.5 (+ 30% bonus ad) (+ 2.25% (+ 1.5% per  mark) of target's current health)

scalingPartType: % per  mark of target's current health

3.text: Wolf's Frenzy ends immediately if Lamb leaves the area or dies.

0.text: Active: Lamb fires a shot at the target enemy that upon arrival marks them for 4 seconds and  slows them by 50% for 1 second.

1.text: Lamb's attacks against the marked enemy refresh the mark's duration and apply a stack, stacking up to 2 times. Her next basic attack against the target while they are at 2 stacks will direct Wolf to pounce them, consuming the mark to deal bonus physical damage, capped at 300 against  monsters.

origin: 80 / 100 / 120 / 140 / 160 (+ 80% bonus ad) (+ 8% (+ 0.5% per  mark) of target's missing health)

scalingPartType: % per  mark of target's missing health

2.text: Wolf's pounce will  critically strike for (50% +  52.5%) bonus physical damage against targets below 15% − 65% (based on critical strike chance) of their  maximum health.

0.text: Active: Lamb blesses the ground under herself for 4 seconds and enters a 0.264 seconds cast time. All units inside the zone cannot be reduced below  10% of their maximum health, and will become  invulnerable for the remaining duration when they reach or are at the threshold, during which they also cannot be  healed, but can still  regenerate health.

1.text: All targetable units within the zone are  healed immediately when the blessing ends.

1.concerningText: After dashing, Lamb fires up to three arrows at nearby  visible targets, each one dealing physical damage upon their arrival. Lamb's current attack target at any proximity will be prioritized by one of the arrows.

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which reveals the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Keywords

  • trinket

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+8% omnivamp against monsters

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sear: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.
Unique – Challenging Path: Using Smite 5 times consumes this item to upgrade your Smite into Challenging Smite, doubling its damage, and grants all item effects permanently after a 2.5-second delay.
Unique – Huntsman: Killing large monsters grants 60 bonus experience. The first large monster killed grants an additional 150 bonus experience, for a total of 210. If you are at least 2 levels below the average level of the game, large monster kills grant 50 bonus experience per level below the average level of all players in the game. If your gold from minions is greater than 40% your gold from monsters, a lane minion will grant 13 less gold and 50% reduced experience. This penalty is removed at 20 minutes.
Unique – Recoup: Regenerate up to 8 − 18 (based on level) mana per second when in the jungle or river, based on missing mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – SEAR: Damaging monsters burns them for 60 (+ 30% AP) (+ 5% bonus AD) (+ 2% bonus health) magic damage over 5 seconds. Omnivamp against monsters provided by this item is not reduced by area of effect damage.

Keywords

Passive

Unique: Holds charges that refill upon visiting the shop (2 charges).

Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 10% bonus attack speed.

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Sepsis: Dealing physical damage to enemy champions inflicts them with 40% Grievous Wounds for 3 seconds.
